docinfo.macro:
NEW: Adamzone Forums!


 



Learn More - FAQs - Order Now!

Hi there!

This book has been written by the young child prodigy Adam Spencer from the UK to help you get a good grade in Maths or Math!

Adam Spencer, the popular young child prodigy, passed his UK GCSE Mathematics or Math exam at the amazingly young age of just 9 years old!, one of the youngest to have ever done this, achieving a top grade A in the exam. This exam is not normally taken until a student reaches 16!! Much of this he taught himself with the aid of a tutor for just one hour a week. Adam took only 9 months to study and pass the exam.

Not satisfied with that, he then went straight on to achieve his A-level Higher Mathematics or Math exam, passing again at just 10 years old after studying for only nine months!, he is the second youngest in the world to have achieved this according to newspaper reports at the time! This exam is not normally taken until a student reaches 18, and after 2 years of study!!

By the age of 11 Adam held six further GCSE examination passes, in the Sciences, Languages etc., mostly at A* and A grades.

By the age of 13 he held a further 3 full A-level Higher examinations passes in the Sciences and French, all at top grades, once again one of the youngest to have ever done anything like this!

After Adam was denied admission by UK universities due to "red tape", he instead devoted time to helping other students of all ages pass Maths or Math with good grades!

Adam says: "To really help you learn and pass your GCSE or country-equivalent Maths or Math studies and exams, download my NEW mega comprehensive Maths Buster book, now made available for the first time in e-Book format!"

Adam's Maths Buster book is absolutely packed solid with light-hearted, very easy to understand yet extremely informative content, covering a huge spectrum of the Maths or Math syllabus. There is none of the heavy-style of many maths revision books you will find on the market, which are hard to understand and leave you wondering what it all means! Adam makes it really easy to understand in a friendly format.

This book really is unique, you won't find anything like this to help you anywhere else! It really is a one-of-a-kind book, written by Adam himself in his own popular style. Who better to learn Maths from than someone who passed at age 9 with a top Grade A !

For GCSE level Maths in the UK or Math in the USA and Maths in Australia, or anywhere where someone wants to learn and pass their math exam!, the book has 116 pages packed full of content, detail, handy hints, diagrams, examples, questions, answers and more, spread through 15+ chapters and subjects, everything you need to help you get a top grade in your maths or math exam!

Written in Adam's popular, light-hearted and easy to understand style, it also includes an all NEW chapter on Graphs, PLUS Adam reveals the powerful method he used to pass with top Grade A in his UK maths exam at just 9 years old! If you are a student studying maths, young or old, you have to have this brilliant study book by Adam!

This fantastic revision study e-Book costs just £12.99 (US $22), as Adam said, "I want to keep the price affordable for students of all ages and countries".

There are countless hours of work put into this book to help YOU pass your exam in Math/Maths, it's just like having Adam as your own tutor!, so what are you waiting for!? Just click the link below and get started!

----------------------------------------------------------------

The All-NEW Maths Buster Unique Revision Study e-Book by Adam Spencer!
Just £12.99 ($22 US).

Simple Online Ordering - 1 Click, Instant Delivery Any Time, Immediate Download, No Fuss!

Click Here to Buy Now!
